SELECT b.id agencyId,b.name agencyName,c.id companyId,c.name companyName FROM qyfinance.finance_agency_company a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.RebateAgency b ON a.agencyId = b.id LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwCustomerCompany c ON a.companyId = c.id
AND a.agencyId = #{agencyId}
SELECT DISTINCT a.cycle FROM qyfinance.RebateCustomerBill a ORDER BY a.cycle DESC

SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT_WS('-',a.apiTypeId,a.stid) type_stid,CONCAT_WS('--',b.name,c.name) type_stid_name FROM qyfinance.RebateCustomerBill a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwApiType b ON a.apiTypeId = b.id LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwMobileOperator c ON a.stid = c.id
